# Make folders

```{r}
source(
  "R/make_bruv_dir.R"
)
```

```{r}
make_bruv_dir(
  campaign_name = "FLD25",
  no_sets = 44, 
  no_per_set = 6
)
```

# Find empty folders

```{r}
source(
  "R/find_empty_folders.R"
)
```

```{r}
root_directory <- "C:/FLD25"
empty_folders <- find_empty_folders(root_directory)
print(empty_folders)
```
